name: Bethesda Launcher
notes:
Included is a script named <tt>helper.sh</tt>, placed in the launcher folder, it's used to workaround an issue with installing and updating games. 

It's located in Bethesda Launcher folder <tt>$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Bethesda.Net Launcher</tt>

To use: Install your game through the launcher and wait for the error, open a terminal, <tt>cd</tt> into your Bethesda.net Launcher folder, and run <tt>./helper.sh</tt>. Install your game.

task.name: wineexec
task.description: Installing Bethesda Launcher. Please do not sign in. Launcher will close shortly after opening.

content:
files:
- setup: https://download.cdp.bethesda.net/BethesdaNetLauncher_Setup.exe
- helper: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Makaronelle/bethesda-linux-helper/master/helper.sh
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Bethesda.net Launcher/BethesdaNetLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Bethesda.net Launcher
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2012 corefonts win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    description: Installing Bethesda Launcher. Please do not sign in. Launcher will
      close shortly after opening.
    exclude_processes: BethesdaNetLauncher.exe
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Bethesda.net Launcher
    src: helper
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Bethesda.net Launcher/helper.sh
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
